segments.text: I notice the little girl is just standing there, waiting for her brother to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so excited, like she’s sure he’s going to succeed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching, and I’m worried he’s going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re both going to be in so much trouble if the woman sees them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, and he’s just balancing on it like it’s nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s face is just full of anticipation, and it’s kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t drop that plate he’s holding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just so full of potential for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re both being really brave, but also really reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR
